title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, March 15, 2020
description: On this day in 1965, LBJ gave his “We Shall Overcome” speech demanding legislation to guarantee equal voting rights for all Americans.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1965, LBJ gave his “We Shall Overcome” speech demanding legislation to guarantee equal voting rights for all Americans.
